summary: Adds a spell tome to Whiterun, which teaches \"Death Ray\", an insta-kill spell based on the spell \"Sparks\".
descriptionHtml:
[color=yellow][i]Author Note: This will be one of my final full mods for Nexus, then I will be moving to Forge. My mod page is linked in the files\' mirrors[/i][/color]


========
Location
========

The spell tome is located on the ground by the end of the right side of the gate bridge in Whiterun (beside the Blacksmith).

** Video below.



============
What it does
============

The spell tome teaches you a modified \"Sparks\" spell which has just short of 1,000,000 damage. This means that it can kill literally everything that is within range.

Note: The spell DOES have quite limited range, as with the Sparks spell, and cannot kill essential people (like children) unless you have a mod that makes them killable.



=====
Video
=====

This video shows the location and the spell:
http://youtu.be/aZjmP1PCAbk



=======
Credits
=======

Mod creator: TrueChaoS
Based on a spell by Bethesda
Made using Bethsda\'s Creation Kit
author: TCS
